this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - red - yarn needle - scissors final size - diameter of 11 cm technical notes *the slip_stitch joins in round 1 and 2 are worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern blood red round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *for round 3 you will be making 8 drips round 3 drip 1 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 5 sts drip 2 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 7 sts drip 3 chain 4 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in the next chain then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch in the next st 4 sts drip 4 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts drip 5 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 6 sts drip 6 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 7 chain 6 start
